Author: couchred

Comment: Tariffs (AKA:  Import Taxes) might have something to do with it:  Tariffs go up - prices go up.  Prices go up - sales go down.  Sales go down - profits go down.  Profits go down - companies cut back or go under.  Companies cut back or go under - people lose jobs.  People lose jobs - sales go down (even more).  Sales go down (even more) - profits go down (even more).  Profits go down (even more) - more companies cut back or go under.  More companies cut back or go under - even more people lose their jobs.  The whole thing becomes a death spiral - which leads to a depression.  Unless Congress acts to stop it - things are going to get much much worse.
